title: UserAgents
extract: In computing, a user agent is software (a software agent) that is acting on behalf of a user. One common use of the term refers to a web browser that "retrieves, renders and facilitates end user interaction with Web content". ... In the SIP, the term user agent refers to both end points of a communications session.
extract_html: In computing, a user agent is software (a software agent) that is acting on behalf of a user.
